vk_overlay_items.json: Layout of Overlay items.
Data for every overlay item 'Item' is a map with the following keys:
- type: one of OverlayType types (with constructor params), such as 'PerSecond' or
'RunningGraph(64)'
- color: in [R,G,B,A] format where every value is in [0,255]
- coords: in [X,Y] which is the distance from the edges of the window, with negative
values representing distance from the right/bottom edge.  If a value is given
in the form of 'Item2.<edge>.<mode>', the calculated value for <edge> in Item2
is used.  <edge> is one of:
- 'left', 'right': valid for x
- 'top', 'bottom': valid for y
<mode> is one of:
- 'align': the requested value is used
- 'adjacent': the value is calculated such that two items become adjacent
- font: for Text items, one of 'large', 'medium' and 'small'
- length: for Text items, maximum number of characters for this item
- bar_width: for Graph items, size of each graph bar.
- height: for Graph items, the height of the graph.
- text: for Graph items, data for the attached Text item.  This is a map with the same
Text keys as above except type, which is implicitly Text.
